title: Reverend Leonard Suswa
description: He was advising students on life matters and the importance of putting God first on their prayer day.

title: Board member
description: She was guiding the students on the life choices and also the importance of working hard. This was during the prayer day.

title: Principal Beatrice Sang
description: Meet our principal. She has always advised the students in all aspects of life.

title: Students
description: These are the pioneer students. This was during their prayer day as their student leader gave thanks to staff and the board members for having walked the journey together.

title: Teachers
description: These are some of the teachers involved in day to day activities with the students
